item.title: Libya’s Rival Governments Both Deny Deal to Take Deported U.S. Migrants
item.description: U.S. officials have said the Trump administration plans to send immigrants to the divided country on military flights as soon as this week.

item.title: Live Updates: Cardinals Gather in Sistine Chapel to Elect Pope
item.description: The conclave to select the next leader of 1.4 billion Roman Catholics, a secretive vote wreathed in history and ritual, comes at an uncertain moment f...

item.title: A top cardinal asks for divine guidance at a ‘difficult’ moment in history.
The Symbolism Behind India’s ‘Operation Sindoor’
item.description: The name for the military attack on Pakistan brings to mind a woman who became shorthand for the grief wrought by a terrorist attack.

item.title: Cardinals Begin Conclave With an Oath
item.description: The cardinals at the Sistine Chapel in Vatican City vow to follow the rules of the conclave, the process by which the next pope is chosen.
